Name: Fork Knights
About the game: Fork Knights is a light-hearted multiplayer brawler featuring cute, food themed characters fighting for BBQ dominance. The aim of the game is to eliminate your opponent by stabbing them with your weapon or using items in creative ways. Throw a banana to make other players slip, giving you an opening, or simply launch a fireball and incinerate your way to victory. You'll be lunging and fighting among various themed stages, each with their own unique mechanics to watch out for. Features: Local multiplayer for up to four players Various game modes to keep the food fresh! Unlockable fighters, stages, and weapons AI opponents to test your mettle Achievements More to come!
